news.header: Customer Appreciation Week: A Big Thank You to Our Loyal Patrons
content: To express our gratitude for your unwavering support, we're hosting a Customer Appreciation Week from February 5 - February 10. Enjoy surprise discounts, freebies, and special treats as a token of our appreciation.
Hit us up for your orders on our social media or you may contact us at 09084257473/ 09365888562.

news.header: Coffee Art Exhibition: A Fusion of Creativity and Caffeine
content: Step into the world where art meets coffee in our upcoming Coffee Art Exhibition.
Local artists will showcase their masterpieces inspired by Cafe ESGUERRA's coffee culture.
Mark your calendars for an immersive experience of creativity and caffeine.

news.header: Loyalty Card Rewards: Sip, Collect, and Redeem!
content: With every coffee purchase, receive a charming sticker on your Loyalty Card. Whether it's our signature Espresso Bliss, a frothy Cappuccino, or a refreshing iced beverage, each order earns you step closer to free indulgence.

Once your Loyalty Card boasts 10 stickers, the magic happens! Redeem your completed card for a free drink of your choice. It's our way of saying thank you for being a valued part of the Cafe ESGUERRA family.

news.header: Indulge your palate with just a few clicks!
content: FREE DELIVERY with no minimum purchase within Cainta, Rizal (Any point between Junction and Estrella).
Hit us up for your orders on our social media or you may contact us at 09084257473/ 09365888562.
We would like to inform you that we will be having a private event today, January 2, 2024. We will be closed at 8 PM onwards. See you all tomorrow!
